Line.MultilineString: "So as I'm sure you're all aware, the places you adventure are often not the safest places in the world. Often they are filled with monsters."
"Today, I shall teach you how to defend yourself."
"When a monster attacks it will change an orb to a skull. If you don't manage to clear that orb before the counter reaches 0 you will lose 1 health."
"Match in the tiles around the monster to hit it for some damage."
"Come back tomorrow and try again. Remember to block my attacks next time!"
"Well done. Monsters will sometimes also move around, or do special attacks, so don't get complacent.
